scripts.start: sudo grep -qxF '127.0.0.1 greenhouse.chrisineson.com' /etc/hosts || sudo bash -c 'echo "127.0.0.1 greenhouse.chrisineson.com" >> /etc/hosts' && sudo grep -qxF '127.0.0.1 greenhouseapi.chrisineson.com' /etc/hosts || sudo bash -c 'echo "127.0.0.1 greenhouseapi.chrisineson.com" >> /etc/hosts' && sudo PORT=80 HOST=greenhouse.chrisineson.com react-scripts start
